name: T***s Web Admin
description:
This is a website admin located in the company's T***s ecosystem. 
This is one of the products to manage items in the company's end-to-end encrypted information exchange ecosystem including Desktop Application, Android, IOS devices and system servers.

name: E***TC Translator
description:
This is a translation app. 
This application is used in combination with AI Model developed from Python to translate special languages in Southeast Asia such as: Vietnamese, Thai, Lao , Khmer, Indonesian, Malaysian. 
The system can translate text and files. For files, the system will extract the content of the file and then translate it, trying to preserve the format of the text as much as possible. 
Supported document types: TXT, DOCX, HTML, RTF, PDF.

name: G**ST - Giam *** ***
description:
This is a project to collect data from domestic and foreign ship management sources, process virtual data to one format for the purpose of managing the patrolling of ships in the Vietnam Sea. 
Assist the Vietnam Marine Police in tracking ship location, searching ships in distress, viewing detailed ship information and many other necessary functions.

name: S****e Gateway
description:
This is software that acts as a data connection port. 
Used to process data, send data from the internet to the WAN. 
Data passing through this connection port will be encrypted through bGlobal company's T***s encryption system.

name: T***s Desktop App
description:
This is an application for messaging, calling, online conferencing and applying end-to-end encryption (E2E) technology. 
The application can run on all 3 operating systems Window, MacOS and Linux. 
This is one of the three main products in the company's T***s end-to-end encrypted information exchange application ecosystem, including Desktop App, IOS and Android.

name: B***n Web Admin
description:
This is the admin website for the purpose of managing customer's POS devices. 
The application has the function of managing the pos machines that the shop owns, managing each category and product of each POS machine of the shop. 
Supports creating and managing catalogs by importing/exporting CSV files. 
In addition, the application also supports creating product sales report diagrams by shop and many other additional functions.

name: P***F Viewer
description:
This is an application which can reads PDF files in the ecosystem of client's company. 
This application performs the same functions as other PDFViewer, but it will be able to customize according to the needs of the user, set up security by encrypting the password of the PDF file. 
Only users who have permission to view documents can open files and read them on the MOL PDF Viewer's system.

name: Sh****kita
description:
This is a website that uses PWA technology to provide a new way to find jobs. 
The application can work on PC and mobile devices. 
The functions of the application are to filter jobs, save and delete jobs that are not suitable, view job details, contact the company working, view history of viewed jobs, ...

name: JS***MR
description:
This is an admin website that manages users and events of an academy in Japan. 
The system allows users to view information about upcoming events at the academy, and then decide to pay to participate in that event. 
Admin will have the right to manage users, manage events, view user payment status, manage user contributions through the donation system.

name: D***** RCRDS
description: This is a landing page for a music label combined with a CMS page, with the purpose of sharing information about the group's artists, new albums and features related to applying for copyright to use music and image.

name: S****** Shipping Line
description: This is a logistics management website for the maritime transport system.
